name: Clicksposure
tag_list: friends, family, meet, treat, greet, date, professional, blog, facebook, reviews, restaurants, bars, dating, food, social, fun, new, free
overview:
Clicksposure is a hyperlocal social networking platform that focuses equally on the places that we frequent as the people that enrich our lives.

Clicksposure enables you to not only share your most favorite restaurants, antique shops, or art galleries with others but also provide specific recommendations or suggestions. Moreover, you can highlight the exceptional places where youâ€™d like to meet and treat others. You can â€œMeetâ€ people for platonic friendships, casual first dates, or group outings or â€œTreatâ€ people to really impress your friends or to find folks interested in starting a relationship.

Both â€œMeetsâ€ and â€œTreatsâ€ can be viewed as your personal endorsement of fine businesses that have found their niche in the community and deserve praise for their services. Additionally, they serve as a means for other members to learn about your interests and improve your chances of receiving communications from other like-minded individuals.

Ultimately, Clicksposure is whatever you wish it to be. For you, it can serve as a local business directory, a professional networking tool, a dating website, or simply a catalogue of your favorite places. There is no right or wrong way. Just have fun, go out, and clickspose yourself to the world!
